attributes.action: Don't ban xl bully's it's the owners not the dogs
attributes.additional_details: Not ban it and not get rid of this lovely breed
attributes.background: Do not ban the dogs , it's not all xl bullies it's bad owners

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
